alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 2:40PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Gusty showers and storms will impact portions of eastern Flagler County through 315 PM EST... At 239 PM EST, emergency management reported gusty winds from showers, storms and outflow along a line extending from near Marineland to near Palm Coast to 9 miles south of Bunnell. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Marineland and Beverly Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler
